entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as the mother of Ron and is referred to by 'they'.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are having a conversation about staying for the wedding.
Harry understands that 'they' refers to Fleur and Mrs. Weasley.
Ron corrects Harry's understanding of the number of days they need to stay for the wedding.
Ron is concerned that Fleur and Mrs. Weasley will be upset if they miss the wedding.
